name: B. Calendar
statement:
Calendars in widespread use today include the Gregorian calendar, which
is the de facto international standard, and is used almost everywhere in
the world for civil purposes. The Gregorian reform modified the Julian
calendar’s scheme of leap years as follows: In this problem, you have
been given two dates and your task is to calculate how many days are
between them. Note, that leap years have unusual number of days in
February.Look at the sample to understand what borders are included in
the aswer.
editorial: This problem can be solve by brute-force, but it come up with a nicer solution if we involve some math.
